knimeNode.name: Conformal Classifier
knimeNode.shortDescription: Produces predictions based on the calibration table and the significance level provided by the user.

fullDescription.intro: Produces predictions based on the calibration table and the significance level provided by the user. The significance level defines the tolerable percentage of the prediction errors.
fullDescription.option: Defines the tolerable percentage of the prediction errors.

ports.outPort: Table with ranked predictions and classes
